title: Ripples
description: The village of Galladale is in mourning. There is a killer on the loose and they have one thing on their mind…..revenge. Erin dives to the depths of the lake to the Merpeople’s realm where she is shown an entrance to the Rock. But is Erin ready to discover what is really inside? And will the killer be caught before they strike again?
author: Lavinia Urban
